metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3566 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability, which was classified as problematic, was found in LinuxKernel. This affects the function tcp_getsockopt/tcp_setsockopt of thecomponent TCP Handler. The manipulation leads to race condition. It isrecommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The identifier VDB-211089was assigned to this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
